0: The Aisne-Marne American Cemetery and Memorial

--------------------
Text: The Aisne-Marne American Cemetery and Memorial is a 42 acre World War I cemetery in Belleau, Northern France.
Triplets:<The Aisne-Marne American Cemetery and Memorial
1:
--------------------
Text: Aisne-Marne American Cemetery and Memorial:  It is at the foot of the hill where the Battle of Belleau Wood was fought, with many American fatalities.
